duties_responsibilities.duty: Handle tax return printing, assembly, and delivery processes using firm software tools and documentation management systems.
Manage tax client documents such as engagement letters and statements of work.
Execute e-file process for external client tax returns and monitor filing deadlines.
Assist in new client setup, tax organizers, and scanning of client workpapers.
Provide tax support in various areas and report on workflow and due date tracking.
Attend to other assigned duties related to tax engagement support services.

education_certification.credential: Specialized training for tax software and process
